mapper.sql: id, study_paragraph, grade, version, label, picture_name, picture_url, course_name, status, create_time, update_time, delStatus
mapper.select: SELECT count(uv.vocabulary_id) wordCount, u.unit_name unitName, u.id unitId FROM teks_unit u join teks t on t.unit_id = u.id WHERE u.course_id = #{courseId} GROUP BY u.id order by u.id asc

select c.id courseId, c.course_name courseName, c.version , count(distinct t.unit_id) `count` from student_study_plan ssp, teks_course c, teks_unit u , teks t where ssp.course_id = c.id and u.course_id = c.id and ssp.type = #{type} and t.unit_id = u.id group by c.id order by c.id asc
